alert.note: Alert for Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 12:56AM MDT until May 12 at 1:45AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEADE...EASTERN LAWRENCE AND WEST CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1255 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles southeast of Galena to 2 miles south of Black Hawk, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Western Rapid City, Sturgis, Black Hawk, Summerset, Johnson Siding, Nemo, Piedmont, Silver City, Hisega, Tilford, Brownsville, Galena, Pactola Reservoir, Dalton Lake, Bear Butte State Park, Apple Springs, Roubaix Lake and Fort Meade. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 25 and 56. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
